111112.content:
Mega Man had reached Wily's fortress. It had been a long journey.

Mega Man moved through the fortress. The enemies were powerful, but it was nothing Mega Man wasn't used to. After much travel, Mega Man came face to face with...
111112.title: Captured By Wily and Modified

1111122.content: It was the mad scientist and inventor, he figured he'd see him either way during this adventure as he piloted his usual ship which Mega Man failed to notice was equipped with a new laser which the doctor immediately fired.
1111122.title: Dr. Wily

choices: Mega Man ends up getting him.
Mega Man ends up being unscathed.
11111222.content: Luckily for the Blue Bomber he had a fast response time despite not seeing the laser until after it was fired and managed to dodge it. "Is that all you got Wily?" With a growl Wily began to fire more of the lasers at an intense rate with Mega Man firing a single shot at the laser cannon Wily was using and blasts it into pieces.
11111222.title: Mega Man dodges.

choices: Mega Man stops and holds his head as he starts feeling more effects.
Mega Man keeps changing physicall but fails to notice.
111112221.content: "OW!" Mega Man screamed as he hit the ground, his hand rubbing the area the laser hit, he failed to notice the smile on Wily's face as he quickly stood up with his mega blaster ready to fire again. "If that was meant to kill me then you should really make stronger weapons!" What happened next Mega failed to notice to as his body began to change from blue to pink starting from the spot he was hit at.
111112221.title: Mega Man ends up getting him.

1111122212.content: With that Mega Man continued fighting as his brown hair underneath his helmet began to turn blond and grew in length as Mega Man began to grow breasts on his chest. "Man...this fight is much more tiring than they usually are." Rock said as Wily flew away acting like he lost the battle but in reality went to a hiding spot nearby seeing Mega's eyes turn pink. "I wonder what that was about with Wily..."
1111122212.title: Mega Man keeps changing physicall but fails to ...

11111222121.content:
"Looks like I'd continue on." Rock said, still unaware of his body changing.

Eyelashes sprouted from his eyes, fairly long and cute. His lips began to pucker out, looking suited for kissing as they painted themselves red.

From the waist down, Rock's hips expanded as his waist shrunk, lending him an hourglass figure. His equivalent of male genitalia receded into his body, reconfiguring themselves into organs designed for a female.

As Rock was preparing to continue he didn't realise he would then be known as Mega-Woman from now on.

Does his mind start to change?
11111222121.title: Continue physical changes

111112221211.content: Will she have bimbo mind or just how he'd be if he was a female from his creation?
111112221211.title: Yes.

choices: Despite some changes in memories Mega Woman fights back
1111122212112.content: As continued on in the base her memories of previous adventures started to change as she no longer was the young male hero stopping while but rather a Robot Master that happily served Wily. "I think I understand now..." it was then that Wily decided it was best to come out from his hiding place as he approached Rock.
1111122212112.title: Option 2

111113.title: other

choices: Mega Man steps in the dust on the floor that Roll didn't clean yet.
1111131.content:
Roll was working in the lab cleaning up when Mega Man walked into the room.

"Hey Roll,"said Mega Man.

"Watch your step Mega Man. I just started to clean in here,"said Roll.

"Alright. I just need to get something for Dr.Light,"said Mega Man.
1111131.title: Yes

choices: Her sister, Splash Woman, came in.
11111312.content:
Mega Man attempts to be careful on where he steps, but he unknowingly steps in a spot Roll hadn't gotten to yet. This caused her to shout, "Mega Man!"

Mega Man was embarrassed. "Oops. Sorry Roll." He said as he grabbed a screwdriver. "I hope Dr. Light can figure out what those things are that I managed to get from Dr. Wily's robots."

He then proceeded to leave the lab. 'I wonder what he found this time...' she thought. While she was curious, she was also a bit sad. 'I miss when Rock was just a helper like me. Wily always keeps him so busy, he hardly has time to spend with me anymore.' After Mega Man left the lab...
11111312.title: Dusty. Isn't it?

choices: "I don't see what difference that would make."
"I think I would like to have another sister."
111113122.content:
Roll noticed Splash Woman was now entering the lab. "Oh. Hello Splash." she said. "Good morning my dear big sister." Splash responded.

Splash Woman was looking around the lab. "Cleaning the lab?" she asked. Roll happily nodded her head. "Sure am. You know me." Splash proceeded to laugh. "We're all programmed with our interests in mind." The lab then became silent for a moment and Roll continued her cleaning while Splash sat in a nearby chair.

After a while, Splash Woman broke the silence. "So it's just the two of us here. Dr. Light's only girls hanging in the lab."

Roll pondered what Splash had said. "I never thought about it, but you're right. We are the only girls in the family." Splash nodded. "Wouldn't it be nice if we had another sister?"
111113122.title: Her sister, Splash Woman, came in.

choices: Go see what Mega Man found
1111131222.content:
Roll nodded to Splash Woman's question. Splash proceeded to yawn. "Yup. Would definitely be great. Maybe at some point we could convince Dr. Light to build us another one." Splash then looked toward the door. "By the way, are you as curious as I am about what Mega Man has found?"

Roll thought for a moment. She then nodded. "I don't suppose you would be interested in checking it out with me?"
1111131222.title: "I think I would like to have another sister."

choices: Roll tries to convince Dr.LIght to turn Megaman into a girl.
Roll doesn't want to mess with her brother with whatever he has inside him.
11111312221.content:
"Sure why not?"asked Roll.

"Come on let's go,"answered Splash.

The two of the two went to go to see were Megaman went and heard him talking to Dr.Light.

"Yes I can remove it,"said Dr.Light."However while I do the operation you won't be able to move or speak."

"I see,"said Megaman."How long would the operation last?"

"About two hours give or take,"said Dr.Light."Any other questions before we begin."

"No none,"said Megaman."I just want to get this over with."

'Operation and Megaman will be out cold?pondered Roll.'Maybe I should convince Dr.Light to turn Megaman into a girl.'
11111312221.title: Go see what Mega Man found

111113122212.content:
Roll shook her head. 'No. He wouldn't accept the proposal.I know we all know him too well. besides, the thing in Mega Man could be fatal.'

Dr. Light and Mega Man pass by Roll and Splash Woman and head toward the lab. "By the way, when Crystal Man lodged one of his crystals into your system, how did you manage to smuggle those two items from him?" Mega Man shrugged. "Just got lucky. Still, if what you said about those things is true, it's a good thing I got them away from Dr. Wily." Roll Wondered what they were talking about.

Just then, Roll noticed Splash Woman over by the counter calling her over. Roll walk to her. "Did you find something?" she asked. Splash nodded. "Check out these devices." Splash Woman held up two strange little devices. One of them looked like a pen. The other appeared to be a stun gun of sorts. "This is what Mega Man got off of Crystal Man?" she asked. She didn't know what these things were supposed to be. Just then, Splash took a nearby piece of paper and the strange pen and proceeded to write on it, "Roll says to me that she likes me the most of her siblings." Just then, Roll proceeded to say to Splash, "Um... Sis?" Splash turned. "What is it Roll?" Roll looked nervous. "I just wanted you to know that out of all our siblings, I like you the most." After having said that, Roll realized what she just said. "Did that pen alter my AI to make me say that you were my favorite?" Both Roll and Splash were surprised. They looked at the pen. Then they looked at a nearby apple. Splash proceeded to write, "The apple in front of us turned into an orange."
111113122212.title: Roll doesn't want to mess with her brother ...

choices: Has the attitude that Splash wrote
1111131222122.content:
After waiting a while, Roll and Splash concluded that the apple wasn't going to change. "Maybe it only works on machines." Roll said. Splash responded, "Or maybe it only works on minds. Let's try a different subject. They look out a nearby window to see a grumpy human. "Mangy robots. technology has advanced far too much. I know since I always have to sign my name, Morty G. Gavin, electronically! I just wish things were more classic."

Splash and Roll nodded. "He could be a good subject." Roll said. Splash then wrote onto the paper. "Morty G.Gavin is a kind man who loves today's technology and is eager to see how it gets better."

Roll and Splash look out the window. The man...
1111131222122.title: Nothing happens

choices: Splash Woman has a better idea
11111312221221.content:
His attitude soon changed not a moment later.

"I love technology what am I saying? I can't wait to see the new advancements!"

He then went off.

"Wow I guess it does work on minds,"said Roll."That means..if we wanted to we can have Dr.Light turn Megaman into a girl with this device."
11111312221221.title: Has the attitude that Splash wrote

111113122212212.content:
"That would be nice, but let's think about it." Splash said. "Although we would be able to convince Dr. Light with this, do you really think Mega Man himself would follow through? and what about the rest of our brothers? Don't you think the would be concerned about the doctor turning him into a girl against his will?" Roll pondered what Splash Woman said. "What I think is we have Mega Man himself ask the doctor." Splash then proceeded to pick up the gun.

"So if the pen can modify minds, what do you think this thing does?" She said as she looked at the gun. Roll turned to her. "Be careful with it. Especially since we don't even have any idea what it does." Just then Splash Woman...
111113122212212.title: Splash Woman has a better idea

1111131222122122.content:
Roll was taken by surprise. "Ouch! I told you to be careful." she said. Just then, she noticed something different about herself. She was growing a few inches taller. "Does that thing affect the appearance of robots?" she asked. Splash continued to look at the device. "It doesn't look like it was made to be used on organic life. That's for sure." She said.

Roll then became concerned. "It's nice to be a bit bigger, but how will our brothers and Dr. Light react to this?" As Roll pondered her slightly increased height, her chest also expanded by a bit. "Oh? It's able to change more than my height." Roll then decided to take a look in a mirror. Before she could reach one though, she started feeling dizzy. After stumbling for a while, Roll passed out.
1111131222122122.title: zapped Roll

11111312221221222.content:
An hour passed. Roll proceeds to wake up. Splash was still standing there. "Are you okay Roll?" she asked. "I think so." Roll responded. she walked over to the mirror. although her appearance hadn't changed by a lot, she was definitely taller and her chest appeared to be slightly bigger. "So it wasn't a dream. That gun really changed me." she said. Splash nodded and smiled. "Not only that, but to the rest of the family, you've always looked like that. I wrote that with the pen." she said. "Get this. the pen can work on multiple minds at once. We're even able to write the minds and AIs it doesn't effect. that's how you still know what you used to look like."

Hearing this caused Roll to smile. 'Amazing! I don't know how Dr. Wily's robots managed to find such a thing, but they are not getting it back.' she thought. After examining the two devices further, Roll and Splash Woman...
11111312221221222.title: Roll wakes up

111113122212212221.content:
"So what do we do now?"asked Roll.

"We rework our ideas,"answered Splash woman."My idea was to make Megaman tell Dr.Light he wants to be a girl right?"

"Yeah,"answered Roll."But with that stun gun can't we just make Megaman a girl?"

"I don't know if it works on male robots or not,"said Splash Woman."Your idea was to write that Dr.Light wanted to turn Megaman into a girl.How about we rewrite everyone's mind that Megaman wants to turn into a girl and Dr.Light is performing the operation.Of course if he doesn't come out the way that we want him to be we could always use the stun gun to change him a bit."
111113122212212221.title: Decided to rework their ideas.

111113122212212222.content:
"I have a even better idea now!"beamed Roll.

"Oh what is your idea?"asked Splash."

"We use the stun gun to change Megaman and rewrite everyone's mind to believe that,"answered Roll."Also I want Megaman to be my twin sister but still be able to fight Dr.Wily's robot's."
111113122212212222.title: Developed an even better idea.

1111131222122122221.content:
Splash nodded. "I love it! I would have wanted to make him my twin sister, but then again, there would be contradictions in time with that. you on the other hand were built almost around the same time as him."

Both of them nodded at the decision. However, Mega Man was still going through heavy repairs from his battle with Crystal Man. Roll decided it would be best if they waited. In order for their plan to go without any problems, they would need to confront Mega Man alone.

after another hour passed, Dr. Light had finished with the repairs. Mega Man decided to take a rest. "Only four more robot masters. Dr. Wily will be stopped again." Roll and Splash knew this was their chance. Roll walked up to Mega Man. "Brother, can we talk about something in the lab?" she said. Mega Man shrugged. "I guess so." Mega Man, Roll and Splash Woman went back into the lab together.

"So Roll. What were you wanting to talk about?" Mega Man asked. Roll smiled. "Do you remember when we were first built?" she asked. Mega Man nodded. "Yeah. Before I became a fighting robot." he said. Roll then replied, "I often think about the times when you were here with me helping Dr. Light. Now you are often busy fighting Wily and his robots. I hardly get to see you as often anymore." Mega Man nodded. "I understand. I don't do this because I want to. I do it because I have to. Wily gave us no other choice." Roll nodded. "I just know there is a way for us to put an end to his horror." Roll proceeded to signal Splash Woman who proceeded to pull out the gun. Mega Man hadn't noticed. He was busy taking his helmet off. Splash then proceeded to zap Mega Man. "Ouch! What was that?" he said. Just then he noticed what Splash had in her hand. "Splash Woman? Why are you holding that? It not a toy!" he said. Just then, he realized what had happened. "Y-you didn't!" Roll smiled. "Don't worry Rock. We'll be a happy family again."

Mega Man started feeling changes happening to him. The changes started with...
1111131222122122221.title: Splash Woman Likes the idea

11111312221221222212.content:
Mega Man's hair started to grow out and turn blonde like Roll's.

"What are you doing if you turn me into.."

"We know what we are doing brother,"said Roll interrupting him."Don't worry."
11111312221221222212.title: his hair

111113122212212222121.content:
Megaman height became the same as Roll's.

"Come on Roll..what are you doing?"asked Mega Man.

"You will see,"said Roll.Megaman then began to change again...
111113122212212222121.title: Megaman's height changed

111113122212212222122.content:
Mega Man notice his body forming differently. His chest started expanding. even his armor was changing. he looked in a mirror. His body looked just like Roll's as did his hair.

Suddenly, he felt a tingle in his face. upon opening his eyes from the feeling, he saw that now, he looked exactly like Roll. the exception being the blue dress.

"Roll! What have you done?" he asked. Roll smiled. "It's okay Rock. You'll still be able to fight Wily. At the same time, we'll be happy sisters." Rock wanted to say something, but he suddenly passed out.

Splash smiled. "Okay. We have an hour before she wakes up." She then tosses Roll the pen. "Would you like to do the honors?" Roll nodded. "Thank you Splash."

Roll then took a piece of paper. "Time to finish the changes."
111113122212212222122.title: Megaman's body changed.

1111131222122122221221.content:
Roll wrote down on the paper, "DLN-001 Rock. Built at the same time as DLN-002 Roll. The two were built as twin robot sisters by Dr. Light." She then wrote at the bottom, "The only ones unaffected by this writing are Splash Woman and Roll."

After Roll and Splash smiled, they realized something. "If these were property of Dr. Wily, he'll be looking for them." Roll said. Splash Woman nodded. "We should make sure he doesn't." Roll then proceeded to write, "The only ones who know of this mind bending pen and body changing gun are Roll and Splash Woman." With that, the two proceeded to high five. "Now all we do is wait for our sister to wake up."
1111131222122122221221.title: Keep her name

choices: Rock asks Roll to come with her
11111312221221222212211.content:
Rock began to wake up. She didn't know what had happened. She noticed that Roll and Splash were stand by her. "Glad you're awake sis." Roll said. Rock looked at her. "I must have overexerted myself. I should take it easy."

Rock then got back up. "Thanks for looking after me, Roll." Dr. Light then came into the lab. "Are you feeling alright Rock? Remember that Dr. Wily is still at large." Rock nodded her head. "I understand Dr. Light. I just like to spend time with my sister." Dr. Light nodded. "I understand. I knew building two robots at once would be a good idea. you two get along so well. It makes it hard to see you separate as often as you do."
11111312221221222212211.title: an hour passes

choices: Dr.Light lets Roll be a battle robot

"You know what sister you can come with me,"said Rock.

"I am not a battle robot..Rock you know that,"said Roll.

"Well I know that..but it's hard sometimes without you,"said Rock.
111113122212212222122112.title: Rock asks Roll to come with her

1111131222122122221221121.content:
Dr. Light then spoke up. "Roll, perhaps you would like me to give you some upgrades? I could fit you with the same abilities as your sister if you would like." Roll was surprised by Dr. Light's offer. She then noticed Splash with the pen and a paper. She realized what she had done and proceeded to signal to her to put the pen away.

She then turned back to Dr. Light. She debated on whether to say yes or no. Splash put the pen away. 'I was only trying to help, sis. With this, the choice is yours.' she thought.

Roll pondered. She could be upgraded into a fighting robot just like Rock, or she could remain a helper robot while Rock went out to fight Dr. Wily.
1111131222122122221221121.title: Dr.Light lets Roll be a battle robot

11111312221221222212211211.content:
"Sure I want to be a fighting robot like my sister,"said Roll.

"Of course..let's get started on the operation right away,"said Dr.Light."Unless you want to wait."

choices: Roll wants to spend more time with Rock
Roll wants to fight Dr.Wily's robots.
Roll is doing it for both reasons.

"I want the Operation tomorrow Dr.Light,"said Roll.

"Alright I understand,"said Dr.Light."Tomorrow then."

Dr.Light then left.

"Roll..you didn't have to do this for me,"said Rock.

"Ir's OK sis,"said Roll."We will be able to fight together."

"Do you really want to fight Dr.Wily's robots or is it that you miss me?"asked Rock.
111113122212212222122112112.title: Operation later

choices: "Make me the same as my sister."
"Make me a close combat fighting robot."
1111131222122122221221121123.content:
"It's actually a mix of both." Roll said. "It gets lonely without you sis, but I often wonder how it feels to go up against Dr. Wily myself. I wonder what it would be like to be in your place. At the same time, I wish you didn't have to fight Dr. Wily as often as you do."

Rock smiled. She had Roll face her and said, "It's okay, Roll. Just know that the two of us will always be sisters." Roll nodded her head." Rock began to head out of the lab. "I'll be waiting for you in the living room."

Roll then turned to Splash Woman. "What you did back there was careless." She said angrily. "What if somebody saw you do that? We would have been in big trouble." Splash put her hands over her shoulders."Sorry. I was just trying to help you and our sister bond. no need to get all huffy about it." Roll sighed. "No matter. Just... Be more careful where you use that thing. I didn't erase those things from everyone's minds just so they could be discovered."

Roll then went to see Dr. Light. "I'm ready now." Dr. Light then offered her a selection. "How shall we go about your upgrades Roll?"
1111131222122122221221121123.title: Roll is doing it for both reasons.

11111312221221222212211211231.content:
"Make me the same as my sister,"said Roll.

"Of course..you are going to be out for awhile while I do this,"said Dr.Light."Of course you can still back out."

"No I want to be a fighting robot,"said Roll.

"Alright..alright,"said Dr.Light as Roll went over to the table and layed down.Dr.light then started the Operation.
11111312221221222212211211231.title: "Make me the same as my sister."

111113122212212222122112112312.content: After some time had passed, Roll woke up from her operation. she looked in the mirror. 'huh. that's weird. I don't look any different.' Dr. Light then spoke up. "I have outfitted you with a buster cannon just like your sister. Also like Rock, you will be able to take the powers of others." Roll was confused. 'It doesn't look like I have a cannon like Rock.' Then she just remembered. Rock still had her fighting capabilities, but she looked exactly like Roll. Roll then imaged her arm cannon. Soon enough, she figured out what she had to do. She then saw as her took on the form of the Roll buster. She was surprised by this. "This is amazing! Thank you Dr. Light." With that, she left the lab. Rock was still waiting for her. "Are you ready sis?" she asked. Roll nodded. "I am."

Roll grabbed Rock's hand as she transferred all the powers she had collected up to that point.

Rock and Roll head warp to the next area where the next robot is said to be. "This place feels very familiar." Rock said. Roll didn't know anything about it. Roll was blasting through it easily. 'It's a good thing I was able to quickly learn how all the functions work so easily. Have to thank Splash for that one.' She thought.

They reach the end of the area, and the Mega twins come face to face with...

Splash woman proceeds to write on a nearby piece of paper. "What did you write?" Roll asked. Just then Roll found herself thinking about Bass. "Splash? Did you just write that I had a crush on one of Wily's robots?" Roll asked. "Maybe. I thought you two would be cute together." Splash said.

Roll takes a paper and begins writing herself.

Roll looked at what she wrote as snickered.

The two get to Splash Woman's area. "I still can't believe Wily reprogrammed her again." Rock said. 'Oh yeah. I forgot that Wily attempted to use her to frame Dr. Light.' Roll thought.

The two travel and eventually reach Splash Woman, who appeared to be grumbling to herself. 'Look who's laughing now, Splash.'

Splash Woman noticed the twins and said, "Oh! Rock!... and Roll. It's good to see you! What business do you have here?"

Rock looked at Splash with anger. "You should know why we're here! You better stop causing trouble or else We'll have to punish you!" Roll nodded. "You should know better, Splash Woman! Don't you know you're hurting innocent people?!" Splash continued to grumble. "You're the reason I'm doing it, Roll."

Roll glared at her. "What was that!" Splash looked at her and said, "I said you're really losing it Roll! Do you really think it matters right now?" Rock became upset with what Splash was saying. "That's enough! You're going to stop right now!" Splash then laughed. Roll could tell it was phony though. "Very well. I guess I'll just have to show my two sisters how much tougher I've become. And I'll be aiming for you the most, Roll."

Tron could tell from Roll's face. After all the things that had happened, it was almost like forcing this on Roll was equal to betraying her. "Roll. we may be friends, but there are some things that even friends have to pay to get." Hearing this had Roll heartbroken. Even Tron felt awful. "However, this just isn't one of those things. "This more than just about what Roll is wanting from us. Besides that, I don't think I'd be able to live with myself if I robbed someone in as much need as him."

"We'll get to that after we deal with another problem." Teisel nodded. "I heard. Don't worry. Once you get the boy here, he'll be safe. We may be pirates, but we're not loan sharks. He can stay here with no charge."

Roll's smile returned. "Thank you Tron." Tron nodded. 'I think I know what Dawn was trying to do there, but there has to be a better way than to try and get her to join with force.'

1411211121212111121111121111231112111111.content:
As Roll heads back to the gesellschaft, she notices some doctors exiting the hospital. 'I guess they heard the explosion.'

Upon returning, Roll found Barrell there as well. "Grandpa? Why are you here?" Barrel turned to Roll. "Tron told me the whole thing. Seeing you here, I assume you were able to stop the bomb?" "Indeed young one, and it has come to my attention that one of our nurses was working on our patients with ill intentions." Roll nodded. "I honestly should have seen this. Levi appeared sweet and innocent, but I never thought she was actually a terrorist."

Dr. Light then turned to the Bonnes. "You have defiled our hospital with your actions. Impersonating a nurse, Taking a patient without consent of registered doctor, and even illicitly operating on them. As you are pirates, I suppose it's no surprise you would perform such criminal acts." Tron looked down in shame. "However..." Tron looked back up on that word. "You did it all with noble intentions, and with that, I shall allow them to be excused. As for Nurse Levi. Well, we can safely say she will not be working with us anymore."

Roll smiled from hearing this. However Dr. Light then said, "Nevertheless, I'm afraid dear Robin cannot stay here. With the events that have happened, we all know that it would be foolish to keep him at this hospital, but to leave him with pirates would be unacceptable either. Not only that, but the group that Levi is truly with will no doubt be targeting you for getting in their way. leaving him in your hands would be dangerous." He then turns to Roll. "I'm afraid that includes you too, Roll. I'm sorry." Roll was horrified when she heard this. "You mean... I can't be with Robin anymore?"

Dr. Light nodded. "I know you wouldn't want to hear that, but it's for the best. They will no doubt go after you too, and if you choose to stay with him, he would no doubt be in great danger. The best choice is to transfer him to a mobile hospital. This will ensure that the terrorists interested in him will have a harder time finding him and he can continue his medical treatments."

As much as Roll hated it, she knew he was right. Tron then decided to ask her again. "Since you're now having to deal with the same enemy as us, maybe you could come with us? Since Levi and Harpy will be coming back for us at some point anyway, being together would be the best choice."

Hearing this, Roll shook her head. "No. I'm sorry Tron. I'll admit that I actually do want to go with you, but I just can't. I'm not a pirate. I'm a digger." Tron was surprised by her answer. 'Well, at least she finally admitted to wanting to join, but why does she continue to refuse?'

1411211121212111121111121111231112111111.content:
Tron knew she couldn't hide it from Zero. 'So much for getting him in the crew.' Zero then snickered. "I'm guessing she thought she would be able to trick him. He may not be the sharpest, but he's definitely smarter than these guys."

Just then, Denise started waking up again. "Huh. could have sworn you'd be out longer then that." Denise was angry. "Listen here. you're here because of the trouble you've caused." she said. Zero didn't show any signs of caring. "Listen. I have enough problems. My two weeks to get out of here have been cut down. Your boss is now thinking I'm getting help with my escape." Hearing this got Denise confused. "Escape? two weeks? what do you mean?" Zero shook his head. "As the captain you shouldn't act like you don't know. He had to have told you about the deal he made." Denise shook her head. "He does tell me many things, but when it came to you all he said was that he would ensure that you wouldn't get far if you escaped." Zero couldn't believe what he heard. "He was going to hunt me down? But he said he wouldn't bat an eye." Denise shook her head again. "Not only that, but I remember overhearing him say that he planned to have you executed in three days from now." This got Zero even more upset. "He what?"

Tron was also upset about this. "It's starting to sound like Gundra had no intention of honoring your agreement at all." she said. "It would seem to be the case." Zero said angrily. Denise didn't know what to say anymore. Her admiral had always treated the prisoners horribly, but she felt this to be overboard. She then remembered a lot of her moments with him. 'No. It's not just the prisoners here. He's treated everyone horribly. He's even abused me when I messed up.'

Zero then looked up. "Hey Tron." Tron turned to the wall between her cell and Zero's. "What is it."

"Swords or not. If we make it out of this, I joining the Bonnes."

Tron was shocked at Zero's revelation. She knew that they had to get Zero out of there before the execution.

Meanwhile, Dawn and Roll had reached Alpha. "That scent. recognize that scent anywhere." He said. Dawn and Roll were disturbed by his appearance. The way his lazy eye twiched as well has how he was hunched. "Good evening Admiral. I... assume you have some business with me?" Dawn then whispered to Roll, "Let's keep note not to recruit this guy." Roll whispered back, "Good idea." The admiral turned to Roll. "Careful around Alpha, Missy. He's quite ravenous." Alpha then proceeded to sniff Dawn. "You smell salty. Me like." Gundra then said to Roll, "For the remainder of the tour, How about you go on ahead?"

Roll was shocked at the admiral's words. At the same time though, she saw this as an opportunity. Dawn nodded her to go. At the same time, Dawn was just as confused by the admiral's choice. After Roll left, The admiral proceeded to turn to Dawn. "Now that she's gone, I'd like to ask. Who are you? Because you're certainly not that wimpy Denise." Dawn became scared. 'Oh no. busted.' she thought as Gundra put his hand on her. "Uh huh. Very nice. I think I've taken a liking to you. Tell me something. The real Denise is locked up. Isn't she?" Dawn hesitantly nodded. Gundra snickered. "Clever girl. You definitely have a lot of spunk pulling a wig over both me and her."

Dawn was afraid of what the Admiral was going to do.
1411211121212111121111121111231112111111.title: Yes

'Now that's just completely low. It's one thing to cross a criminal, but to stab one of your own partners in the back? How is this guy an admiral?'

info.brief_description: Stories of changes made to characters in the many Mega Man Franchises.
info.description:
This story is about transformations. Namely to the cast of mega man. Let's begin with rules:

1. Sex may not be detailed if put into the story (it's rated 13+)
2. Deaths in any written chapters will be put under review. If they are too gruesome, or are the death of somebody important to the story, it will most likely be deleted.
3. No crossovers. I do enjoy those, but let's keep things in their own universes and their own timelines. That said, you are allowed to reference characters from other franchises. Just so we're clear, when I say no crossovers, I mean between Mega Man universes. Note that creating counterparts of characters from other mega man series for a story in the series your writing for does not count as a crossover since every series has had their own counterparts of characters from other series.
4. No transformation that is Mega Man being turned into Quint. I just feel that's cheating a story, especially since it's clarified in the games the Quint is Mega Man from the future. That said, I'm not stopping stories that involve Mega Man being turned evil.... Just so long as he isn't turned into Quint.

Those are the rules. May subject to change, but for now they are what should be followed.
